title: 4 More Stocks for the Next Decade
text:
We've talked about investing for the next decade--and not the past one--before in this column. The trick is, of course, identifying which companies have the best prospects over that time frame. One suggestion we made in a prior article: Focusing on stocks with Morningstar Economic Moat Ratings of wide and narrow and positive moat trends. Another suggestion: isolating high-quality stocks with the network effect as their moat source.

Today, we're peeling back the onion yet another way, by looking at companies featured in the Morningstar Exponential Technologies Index.
description: We think these wide-moat companies are poised to experience meaningful economic benefits in the future.
